screen_desc: The screenshot shows a product listing on the eBay mobile website. The item offered is a USB C OTG cable with a braided design and it supports the Samsung Galaxy S9, among others. The price is listed at GBP 3.99 and there is information about estimated delivery dates. The product is new, with 485 units sold and 109 available, and it comes with a 6-month manufacturer warranty. The user has options to "Buy It Now," "View in cart," or "Watch" the item, and can select the desired quantity before purchasing.

We should first navigate to the shopping cart to clear any items that are currently in it before proceeding with the second part of the request.
action_plan: Navigate to the shopping cart (either by clicking on 'View in cart' or by accessing the cart through the eBay menu or icon)
Clear the shopping cart by removing any items within it
Return to the home page or search page of eBay
Add the item to the cart
